data.text: I tell myself that I should praise Yahweh.
I tell myself that I should praise Yahweh
He forgives all my sins,
he keeps me from dying [MTY],
He gives me good things during my entire life.
Yahweh judges justly and ◄vindicates/does what is right for► all those who have been treated unfairly.
Long ago he revealed to Moses what he planned to do;
Yahweh acts mercifully and kindly;
He will not keep rebuking us,
He punishes us for our sins,
The skies are very high above the earth,
He has taken away the guilt for [MTY] our sins,
Just like parents act mercifully toward their children,
He knows what our bodies are like;
We humans do not live forever [SIM];
but then the hot wind blows over them, and they disappear;
But Yahweh will faithfully keep loving forever
he will act that way to all those who obey the agreement he made with them to bless them if they did what he told them to do,
Yahweh made/caused the heavens to be the place where he rules [MTY];
You angels who belong to Yahweh, praise him!
Praise Yahweh, you armies/thousands of angels who serve him and do what he desires!
All you things that Yahweh has created, praise him;
